fairy_sparkers.name: Fairy Sparkers
fairy_sparkers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age

bottle_rockets.name: Bottle Rockets
bottle_rockets.description: You can shoot them out of a bottle and watch them make a little pop

flower_power.name: Flower Power
flower_power.description: Sure to be a favorite for this year's show! Three-inch core rack, assures a big-bang finish with shots that fill the sky! Each shot features a beautiful pearl ring inside of a brocade ring creating a sensational sunflower effect.

burst_n_bloom.name: Burst 'N Bloom
burst_n_bloom.description: This Acme Explosives brand provides a fantastic variety of colorful crossette breaks, glitter filled peonys and a wide spectrum of color combos consisting of red, green, silver, purple and blue.

mulberry_street_mayhem.name: Mulberry Street Mayhem
mulberry_street_mayhem.description: This fountain has it all! Color flames, strobes with crackle red, red and lemon flowers, green pearls, color swirls with silver , and a titanium red, gren, and blue barrage finale

x-9_panoramic_finale.name: X-9 Panoramic Finale
x-9_panoramic_finale.description: Huge finale bursts timed and angled for panoramic perfection! Red to green wave, gold glitter, red palm, gold palm with green glitter, glitter willow, red wave, silver chrysanthemum, blue wave and silver chrysanthemum.

red_white_and_boom.name: Red White and Boom
red_white_and_boom.description: Alternating beautiful red, white and blue chrysanthemums end with a stellar finale sequence!

powercell_25.name: Powercell 25
powercell_25.description: High-flying mine/wave combinations of red, green, white and blue, with crackling mine with crackling wave finale.
